other_tests.findings: Increasing atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally and new small bilateral pleural effusions; several loculated fluid collections in the right lower quadrant, with the largest measuring 2.6 x 2.7 x 6.2 cm; filling defect in a mesenteric venous branch in the right lower quadrant, unchanged from prior study.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Several loculated fluid collections that are new compared to prior study.
